data.tweet: See the numbers behind Arsenal deafeat in Manchester ⚽️ 🧵 👇
sentences: Arsenal lost 3-1 to Manchester United.

data.tweet: Arsenal causes Mancehster Utd trouble, carrying the ball into the opponent's box 10 times. The average this season for Premier League teams is 4.4 times per 90 minutes. Arsenal also completed 14 passes into the opponent's box, while United managed four.
sentences: Arsenal carried the ball into the opponent's box 10 times.
In their last game (against Aston Villa) Arsenal carried the ball into the opponent's box four times.
The average this season for Premier League teams is 4.4 carries into the penalty area per 90 minutes.
Arsenal managed to play an impressive 14 successful balls into the opponent's box.
Manchester Utd managed to play an impressive 4 successful balls into the opponent's box.
story: Carries into the penalty area (in last match v Aston Villa)
Carries into the penalty area (league average)

data.tweet: Manchester Utd only carried the ball into the final third three times, compared with 22 times for Arsenal. This season Manchester Utd have averaged 11.0 carries into the final third per 90 minutes.
sentences: Arsenal carried the ball into the final third 22 times.
Manchester Utd carried the ball into the final third three times.
This season, Manchester Utd have averaged 11 carried into the final third per 90 minutes.
Premier League team averages 11 carried into the final third per 90 minutes.
story: Carries into the final third (season average)
Carries into the final third (league average)

data.tweet: Arsenal were aggressive out of possession, making seven tackles in the final third - United did so once. In their last game (against Aston Villa) the Gunners attempted three challenges in the attacking third, while the Premier League teams averaged 2.5 per 90 minutes.
sentences: Arsenal attempted to make seven challenges in the final third.
Manchester Utd attempted to make one challenges in the final third.
In their last game (against Aston Villa) Arsenal attempted to make three challenges in the final third.
Premier League teams attempted to make 2.5 challenges in the final third per 90 minutes.
story: Tackles in the final third (in last match v Aston Villa)
Tackles in the final third (league average)

data.tweet: Arsenal also applied pressure high up the pitch, pressing 35 times in the final third while United pressed 11 times in their attacking third.
sentences: Arsenal pressed their opponent 35 times in the final third.
Manchester Utd pressed their opponent 11 times in the final third.

data.tweet: Gabriel Jesus, our man of the match, created some of the best chances of the game - assisting 0.4 expected assists (more than anyone else in a Arsenal shirt).
sentences: Gabriel Jesus was our man of the match.
Gabriel Jesus managed to create an impressive 0.4 xG worth of chances.
Gabriel Jesus created more expected goals than any other Arsenal player.

data.tweet: Gabriel Jesus successfuly completed three key passes and carried the ball into the opponent's box three times (joint most of any player on the pitch, alongside Martinelli).
sentences: Gabriel Jesus completed three key passes.
Gabriel Jesus carried the ball into the opponent's box three times.
Martinelli carried the ball into the opponent's box three times.
Martinelli carried the ball into the opponent's box more times than any other player on the pitch.
Gabriel Jesus carried the ball into the opponent's box more times than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Martinelli successfuly completed 30 passes (more than any other player on the pitch), while Gabriel Jesus completed 28.
sentences: Gabriel Jesus completed 28 passes.
Martinelli completed 30 passes.
Martinelli completed more passes than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Jesus dribbled past an opponent (a match high) three times, recieved 14 progressive passes (also match high) and passed the ball a total of 157 yards towards the opponents goal.
sentences: Gabriel Jesus passed the ball a total of 157 yards towards the opponents goal.

Gabriel Jesus completed one long balls.

data.tweet: Jesus and Saka both attempted to make three challenges (joint most for Arsenal), while Saka played five successful long balls and carried the ball into the final third five times.
